page.title: 07Playground Games. 'Sevens'
page.content: We play many games at school such as One Knee, Mother I,Red Letter, Black Jack and lots more.Some are fun. Sevens is a game with a ball. What you have to do is throw the ball against a wall seven times without letting it bounce. Next throw the ball against the wall, let it bounce and catch it 6 times. Bounce the ball 5 times up and down on the floor.You get to number 4 and you have to let the ball bounce on the floor and when it rises hit it with your hand against the wall and catch it.Do this 4 times. Number 3 is quite hard.You have to throw the ball into the corner of the wall so that it hits the floor and the wall. Number two,throw the ball under your leg and catch it. Number one throw the ball against the wall, turn round and catch the ball without letting it bounce. It is good fun.
